price: 159. Waxaa ka mid ahaa qolodii Muuse  qayb ku hanuunineysey (dadka) si xaq ah oo ku oogayey caddaaladda.
arabic: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin qawmi mūsā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
